translations: 新手，初学者（novice 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Most of us are novices on the computer – just bumbling about on them.
sentences.translation: 我们大多是电脑新手—就在那里瞎折腾。

sentences.sentence: A five-minute handstand is one of the hardships that teaches martial arts novices to eat bitterness.
sentences.translation: 五分钟的手倒立是教武术初学者吃苦的项目之一。

sentences.sentence: A five-minute handstand is one of the hardships that teaches martial arts novices to eat bitterness.
sentences.translation: 五分钟的手倒立是教武术初学者吃苦的项目之一。
